info.title: Verana Indexer API
info.description:
Comprehensive API for managing decentralized identifiers, trust registries, credential schemas, and permissions in the Verana ecosystem.

Indexer endpoints (under /verana/indexer/v1) expose the current indexed block height and a changes feed that can be queried by block_height. Other module endpoints may accept the At-Block-Height header to query historical state; when omitted, they return the latest indexed state.

get.description: Return the latest block height that has been fully processed by the indexer.

200.description: Current indexed block height

get.summary: Get indexer version and environment info
get.description: Return the indexer version and network environment configuration details.

200.description: Indexer version and environment information

get.description: Return the current operational status of the indexer, including whether it is running, whether crawling is active, and any error information if crawling or the indexer has stopped. This endpoint is useful for monitoring and debugging indexer issues.

200.description: Indexer status information

isRunning.description: Whether the indexer service is running. If false, all APIs will return 503.

isCrawling.description: Whether the indexer is actively crawling new blocks and transactions. If false, APIs remain available but no new data is being indexed.

stoppedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the indexer or crawling stopped (if applicable)

stoppedReason.description: Human-readable reason why crawling or the indexer stopped (if applicable)
stoppedReason.example: Crawling stopped due to: Unknown Verana message types: /verana.perm.v1.MsgCreateRootPermission. Indexer APIs remain available.

lastError.description: Details about the last error that caused crawling or indexer to stop (if applicable)

stack.example:
Error: Unknown Verana message types...
    at ...

service.description: Service name where the error occurred

example.stoppedReason: Crawling stopped due to: Unknown Verana message types: /verana.perm.v1.MsgCreateRootPermission. Indexer APIs remain available.

X-Crawling-Reason.description: Reason why crawling stopped (only present when crawling is stopped)

schema.example: Crawling stopped due to: Unknown Verana message types...

X-Crawling-Error.description: Error message that caused crawling to stop (only present when crawling is stopped)

X-Crawling-Stopped-At.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when crawling stopped (only present when crawling is stopped)

At-Block-Height.name: At-Block-Height
At-Block-Height.description: Header to query historical state at a specific block height. When provided, returns the state as it was when the specified block finished processing. When omitted, returns the latest indexed state. Must be a positive integer not exceeding the current indexed block height.

participants.description: Current number of active participants (perm_state=ACTIVE) in this Credential Schema

weight.description: Trust deposit value (sum) of the full permission tree of this schema since the schema was created

issued.description: Total issued credentials (sum) by all issuers of this Credential Schema since it was created

verified.description: Total verified credentials (sum) by all verifiers of this Credential Schema since it was created

ecosystem_slash_events.description: Total ecosystem-governancebased slash events (when an ecosystem participant is slashed by ecosystem governance)

ecosystem_slashed_amount_repaid.description: Cumulated ecosystem-governancebased slashed amount repaid by participants

network_slash_events.description: Total network-governancebased slash events (when a full Ecosystem is slashed by Verana Council)

network_slashed_amount_repaid.description: Cumulated network-governancebased slashed amount repaid by the ecosystem

perm_state.description: The current state of the permission, calculated based on repaid, slashed, revoked, effective_from, and effective_until fields

grantee_available_actions.description: List of actions available to the grantee for this permission, calculated based on permission type, schema modes, permission state, and validation process state

validator_available_actions.description: List of actions available to the validator for this permission, calculated based on permission type, schema modes, permission state, and validation process state

weight.description: The node weight of the permission, calculated as the sum of all trust deposits of this permission and all permissions in its subtree. Includes all permissions regardless of state (expired, slashed, active, etc.). Supports AtBlockHeight directive.

issued.description: Number of credentials issued using this permission and its ancestors. Calculated from PermissionSession messages. Supports AtBlockHeight directive.

verified.description: Number of credentials verified using this permission and its ancestors. Calculated from PermissionSession messages. Supports AtBlockHeight directive.

participants.description: Current number of active participants (perm_state=ACTIVE) (subtree, plus this permission if it is ACTIVE). Supports AtBlockHeight directive.

ecosystem_slash_events.description: Total ecosystem-governancebased slash events (when an ecosystem participant is slashed by ecosystem governance). Supports AtBlockHeight directive.

ecosystem_slashed_amount.description: Cumulated ecosystem-governancebased slashed amount. Supports AtBlockHeight directive.

ecosystem_slashed_amount_repaid.description: Cumulated ecosystem-governancebased slashed amount repaid by participants. Supports AtBlockHeight directive.

network_slash_events.description: Total network-governancebased slash events (when a full Ecosystem is slashed by Verana Council). Supports AtBlockHeight directive.

network_slashed_amount.description: Cumulated network-governancebased slashed amount. Supports AtBlockHeight directive.

network_slashed_amount_repaid.description: Cumulated network-governancebased slashed amount repaid by the ecosystem. Supports AtBlockHeight directive.

activity.description: List of activity items ordered by timestamp descending

block_height.description: Block height when the change occurred

entity_type.description: Entity type (VPR spec name). Only included when different from the top-level entity_type (e.g., for related entities in TrustRegistry history).

entity_id.description: Entity ID. Only included when different from the top-level entity_id (e.g., for related entities in TrustRegistry history).

account.description: Account address that made the change. Only included when available (omitted for system-generated events).

changes.description: Only changed values (fields that actually changed). Null if no changes or for create actions.
